entry.title: Bip-0039/Wordlist - Romanian
entry.summary: Justin Valceanu has created a new Romanian wordlist for Bip-0039 and is requesting permission to push the modified files to Github. While it may not be a hard requirement, it would be useful if the words could be uniquely identified using the first 4 letters as most metal backup plates only have space for 4 letters. There are several occurrences of conflicting words in the first page alone.
